..

Environments
============

A variety of environments for robotic tasks are implemented. The interface of OpenAI Gym are used, as it is kind of standard lately and the MuJoCo physics engine. There are some simple environments, used for testing and some more complex that use the robots in AUTh-ARL.

   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Contents:

   spherereacher
